timeeatermod:TemporaryPowerDemo.NAME: Auto-Generated Temporary Power
timeeatermod:TemporaryPowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Scry this turn, gain !M! Block.

timeeatermod:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
timeeatermod:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

timeeatermod:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Card Parsing, Card Selection, Card Mods
timeeatermod:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.

timeeatermod:InlineCardModDemo.NAME: Inline Card Mods
timeeatermod:InlineCardModDemo.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Strike of any color to your hand. NL Enchant it with "Kills Spikers."

timeeatermod:MultiPreviewDemoCard.NAME: Multiple Previews - One Card
timeeatermod:MultiPreviewDemoCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.
timeeatermod:MultiPreviewDemoCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random Upgraded *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.

timeeatermod:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
timeeatermod:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
timeeatermod:EasyXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

timeeatermod:TimeEaterModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
timeeatermod:TimeEaterModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1: Draw !M! cards or gain !timeeatermod:si! Strength.
